title: MC crosses min ATC in all market structures

content.question: Which of the following statements about cost is always true for both monopolies and perfectly competitive firms?

choices.label: Average total cost equals marginal cost when average total cost is a minimum.
Marginal cost decreases as production increases.
Average fixed cost is equal to marginal cost when average fixed cost is a minimum.
Average variable cost is equal to marginal cost when marginal cost is a minimum.
Average variable cost decreases as production increases.

content.answer: Average total cost equals marginal cost when average total cost is a minimum.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
